geneVariantDescriptions.description: SPOP R138C lies within the MATH domain of the Spop protein (UniProt.org). R138C confers a loss of function to the Spop protein as demonstrated by decreased BET protein degradation (PMID: 32109420), and impaired Ilf3 binding, ubiquitination, and degradation, leading to increased S-adenosyl methionine levels and elevated expression of serine-glycine-one-carbon cycle pathway genes in cultured cells (PMID: 31772275).

references.title: ILF3 is a substrate of SPOP for regulating serine biosynthesis in colorectal cancer.
De Novo Variants in SPOP Cause Two Clinically Distinct Neurodevelopmental Disorders.
